title: Willow Whip
description: A Junior Literary Guild Selection Could the Faber family really own a farm? Could they make enough money to buy one? Her father had almost given up hope, but for Willow it was the only dream worth having. Tenant farmers, the Fabers moved almost every year. To stay put in a good place, Willow would plan, work, save, and sacrifice everything.
author: Irene Bennett Brown
